Shop Categories Securityman SEC-SM-825DTH WiFi Fixed Camera for iWatchAlarm Series Stock photo Actual item may differ slightly from picture (Please check listingTitle/Description for fit, color and size information.)Securityman SEC-SM-825DTH WiFi Fixed Camera for iWatchAlarm Series Item Description App-Based iSecurity WiFi Indoor Camera with Audio and Night Vision. Works as a standalone app-based camera or integratable with iWatchAlarm series. Monitor through a password-protected connnection from PC, Mac, iPhone, iPad, or any compatible smartphone. Connect to a router via WiFi or Ethernet, install software on your PC, or register online with P2P server and then download the free app on your smartphone. 2.4GHz transmission up to 200 feet between walls or 490 feet with a clear line of sight. IR LEDs for 33 feet of black and white night vision. Infrared filtered camera for best vibrant color picture. Bult-in microphone with recording up to 30 feet away. Multiple recording options: micro SD card, smartphone, tablet, Mac, or PC. Two-way audio. Motion detection recording and email alert notification. Package includes indoor camera with bracket, power adapter, software and user manual CD, quick start guide, Ethernet cable, mounting screws. Color: White.
